DOC.brief_title: Profile Newborn Undergoing Early Stimulation Neonatal Intensive Care Unit
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To describe profile newborn undergo early stimulation neonatal intensive care unit , characterize study population , accord variable neonatal risk factor , indication treatment early stimulation . Methods : It conduct descriptive , cross-sectional analytical study carry General Hospital Dr. Cesar call , July December 2010 . The sample consist 116 medical record newborn indicate treatment early stimulation , represent ( 9.2 % ) . The study exclude seven infant type congenital malformation . It use follow variable : weight , sex , gestational age , Apgar score , diagnosis Respiratory Distress Syndrome Intracranial Hemorrhage use mechanical ventilation CPAP .
DOC.criteria: All case newborn admit NICU refer treatment early stimulation record relate incomplete study variable newborns congenital malformation .
